title: Share variables between middlewares in Express
body:
Express has object which can be used to store and access properties, either globally, or within a single request-response cycle.

* Read and write to `app.locals`-object to share data globally, between middleware, from the start of the application until the end.

```
// Write
app.locals.title = 'My App'
app.locals.email = 'me@myapp.com'

// Read
app.locals.title // 'My App'
app.locals.email // 'me@myapp.com'
```

* Read and write to `res.locals`-object to share data within a HTTP-request method.

```
// Write
res.locals.title = 'My App'
res.locals.email = 'me@myapp.com'

// Read
res.locals.title // 'My App'
res.locals.email // 'me@myapp.com'
```
